text: Vincenzo Chimirri (born 7 December 1973) is an Italian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:People from Catanzaro Category:Equestrians of Fiamme Oro
title: Vincenzo Chimirri
